AcceptToFollowDescription: Accept to follow their workouts and see their progress.
Add an exercise by tapping the more butt: Add an exercise by tapping the more button in the top right
AiPlannerSubtitle: Use AI to generate an entire program suited to your goals
AiSessionCreatorSubtitle: Generate a workout session to import into your plan or complete now!
AndroidNotificationPermissionExplanation: Newer Android devices require an additional permission to ensure that rest notifications are delivered on time. Without this permission, they will arrive late and largely be useless. On the next screen, please grant LiftLog the permission.
AppConfigurationSubtitle: Adjust theme and other misc. settings
AutomaticRemoteBackupSubtitle: Send backups to a remote server. Advanced users only
BackUpDataReminder: It has been a while since you last created a backup. It is HIGHLY recommended you back up your data regularly to prevent data loss. Would you like to back up your data now?
BackUpDataSubtitle: Export your data to a file for backup or transfer
BackupFeedAccountMessage:
Include your feed account and followed users in this backup?
Caution: This would allow anyone with this backup to post feed content with your account
BackupFeedAccountSubtitle: Include your feed account data in backups
BackupRemindersSubtitle: Periodically suggest a backup when you have not backed up in a while
BugReportSubtitle: Let us know when you encounter a bug
CompleteAndComeBack: Complete a workout and check again.
DeleteSessionMessage{SessionName}{Date}: The workout named {SessionName}, on {Date} will be deleted from history. This cannot be undone.
EnjoyingLiftLogMessage{Type}{Store}: If so, would you take a minute to leave a {0} on {1}?
ExportBackupRestoreSubtitle: Create and export backups for transferring between devices
FailedToBackupToRemote: Failed to backup to remote server
FeatureRequestSubtitle: Suggest a new feature that you think LiftLog should have!
FinishIncompleteWorkout: You have not filled out all exercises, are you sure you'd like to finish?
GeneratingAiPlan:
Generating AI plan…
This may take up to 3 minutes
ImportFeedDataQuestionMessage:
This backup includes a feed account. Would you like to import it?
You will lose access to your current account without a backup.
This will replace your current account and cannot be undone!
ImportTheirPlanMessage{user}: This will import {0}'s plan. It will not overwrite your existing plan.
LocalisationSubtitle: Set LiftLog's language and default weight units
Max weight lifted in a workout: Max weight lifted in a workout
MigrateWeightMessage: LiftLog now supports setting either pounds or kilograms on each exercise!
MigrateWeightPrompt: Just this once, we'll need you to specify which units for each exercise you've completed in the past.
NeverDoneThisExerciseBefore: You have never done this exercise before
NoFollowingData: Nobody you're following has published anything yet! Come back later.
NoSessionsInMonth{Month}:
Nothing recorded in {0}
Complete a workout or switch to another month to view your sessions.
NoWorkoutsInPlan:
No workouts in plan
Add a workout to get started.
NotFollowingAnyone: You're not currently following anyone, ask a friend for their share link to start!
NotPublishingWorkouts: You are not publishing your workouts
NoteAboutTweakingAiPlan: Note: you can tweak this plan after you accept it. Just head to the Manage Plan page in settings.
NotificationsSubtitle: Adjust notification settings for rest timers
OnlyThoseWithTheLinkCanSee: Only those with the link can see what you've shared.
PlaintextExportDescription: This feature allows you to export your data in a plaintext format such as CSV for use in other applications. It is not intended for backup purposes. For backups, please use the backup feature. LiftLog cannot restore data from plaintext exports.
PlaintextExportSubtitle: Export your data in a plaintext format such as CSV for use in other applications
PlanSharedWithYou: This plan has been shared with you.
PlanWillBeUpdated: The plan will be updated with the current workout's exercises.
PublishBodyweightSubtitle: Publish your bodyweight with your workouts
PublishPlanSubtitle: Publish your current plan for your followers to see and import
PublishWorkoutSubtitle: Publish workouts as you complete them
RemoteBackupDescription:
This is an advanced feature which enables LiftLog to send backups to a remote server.
Please read the documentation for instructions on how to set up a remote server.
RemoveExerciseFromWorkoutMessage{Exercis: This will remove the exercise {0} from {1}.
RemoveExerciseMessage: Exercise will be removed from the current workout, future workouts in the plan will not be impacted.
RemoveFollowerMsgPart2: from following you and remove all your content from their device.
ResetAccountMessage: This will delete your data on the servers and unsubscribe you from all feeds. You will need to resubscribe and share a new link if you want to share your workouts again.
RestNotificationsSubtitle: Show a notification when the rest timer is up
RestoreDataSubtitle: Import data from a file to restore

Select a session to copy {exerciseName}: Select a session to copy {exerciseName} to:
SelectAtLeastOneArea: Please select at least one area to workout
SelectAtLeastOneGoal: Please select at least one goal
SelectNumberOfDays: Please select the number of days per week
SessionInProgress: There is already a workout in progress, start a new one without saving?
SetFirstDayOfWeekSubtitle: Set the first day of the week for the calendar
ShareLinkToGetFollowers: Share your link with friends to get followers
ShowFeedSubtitle: Display the feed in the navigation bar
ShowTipsSubtitle: Show tips on how to use the app
SplitWeightByDefaultSubtitle: Allow you to set the weight of each exercise set by default
There is already a workout in progress,: There is already a workout in progress, replace it without saving?
This will clear the current workout with: This will clear the current workout without saving it to your history
TranslationSubtitle: Submit translations for parts of the app!
TryChangingFilters: Try changing the filters at the top
Unfollow{User}Msg: This will unfollow {0} and remove all their content on your device.
UpdateExistingWorkout{Name}: Would you like to update the existing workout named {0}, or add a new workout?

This will unlock the AI planner, which will generate a plan tailored specifically to you and your goals.

UseImperialUnitsSubtitle: Use pounds in favour of kilograms
